wikipedia_page.main: Charles Beresford Fulke Greville, 3rd Baron Greville  (3 March 1871 – 14 May 1952) was a British soldier and aristocrat.

response: * Charles Greville, 3rd Baron Greville (1871–1952), Baron Greville
His niece Olive Grace Kerr married British aristocrat Charles Greville, 3rd Baron Greville in 1909.
* 	The Honourable Mrs Charles Greville, wife of Charles Greville, 3rd Baron Greville a British society hostess and philanthropist

link_mentions.page: The Manor Country House Hotel, Weston-on-the-Green
response: David Margession (1890-1965) was a politician. In his youth he decided to live in the USA where he met his wife Frances Howard Leggett. The couple married in 1916 and two years later they moved to Weston Manor where they lived for the next four years. In 1922 he sold the house to Charles Greville, 3rd Baron Greville.
